item.title: 会议记录显示，如果物价不降，台湾可能再次加息
item.description: 根据周四公布的会议记录，台湾中央银行的一位董事会成员警告说，如果未来几个月通胀没有缓解，台湾中央银行可能不得不进一步提高利率。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank may have to raise interest rates further if inflation doesn’t ease in the coming months, one member of the monetary authority’s board warned according to minutes released Thursday.】

item.title: 据说交易商将游说重新考虑卢比衍生品规则
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度交易商正计划推动重新审议一项要求货币衍生品必须有相关风险敞口的规定。【原文：Indian traders are planning to push for reconsideration of a rule that requires currency derivatives to have an underlying exposure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行将邮政银行薪酬上调 12.5%，以应对新的成本压力
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已同意将其大部分德国员工的工资提高 12.5%，这增加了首席执行官克里斯蒂安-斯温（Christian Sewing）的成本压力。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has agreed to increase salaries by 12.5% for a large swathe of its German staff, adding to cost pressures for Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing.】

item.title: 可可再次下滑，买家在动荡的市场中持观望态度
item.description: 可可价格再次下跌，延续了一周来的剧烈波动，因为流动性枯竭，商业买家不愿购买可可豆。【原文：Cocoa prices dropped again, extending a week of extreme volatility as liquidity dries up and commercial buyers hold back from buying beans.】

item.title: 日本央行帐目显示日本在美联储周内第二次干预日元汇率
item.description: 根据彭博社对各国央行账户的分析，日本本周很可能进行了第二次货币干预，这是日本加大力度支撑日元的又一迹象。【原文：Japan likely conducted its second currency intervention this week, according to a Bloomberg analysis of central bank accounts, in another sign of its intensified battle to prop up the yen.】

item.title: 飞利浦睡眠呼吸暂停协议为未来的癌症索赔留有余地
item.description: 皇家飞利浦公司（Royal Philips NV）以 11 亿美元解决了美国针对 550 万台召回的睡眠呼吸机的诉讼，但这只解决了当前的案件，并没有为未来可能发生的针对睡眠呼吸机的癌症索赔预留资金。【原文：Royal Philips NV’s $1.1 billion settlement of US lawsuits targeting 5.5 million recalled sleep-apnea devices resolves only current cases and doesn’t set aside monies for potential future cancer claims over the machines.】

item.title: 加密货币的现状不容乐观
item.description:
业内人士表示，他们已经从上一次暴跌中吸取了教训，但监管机构需要加快行动，保护新一波主流投资者免受老一套的影响。【原文：

Industry boosters say they’ve learned their lessons from the last crash, but regulators need to move faster to protect a new wave of mainstream investors from the same old story.

】

item.title: 香港第一季度经济增长超出预期
item.description: 香港第一季度的经济增长速度超过预期，这是一个初步迹象，表明香港在大瘟疫后的复苏正在趋于稳定。【原文：Hong Kong’s economy grew faster than expected in the first quarter, a tentative sign that the city’s post-pandemic recovery is stabilizing.】

item.title: 在创纪录的涨势之后，不宽容的投资者希望获得丰厚的收益
item.description: 在创纪录的第一季度涨势让股市显得昂贵之后，本季度企业盈利和利润预测的丰收才能给投资者留下深刻印象。【原文：It’s taking bumper corporate earnings and profit forecasts to impress investors this season, after a record first-quarter rally left stocks looking expensive.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦通胀率创历史新高，连续第四个月回落
item.description: 由于创纪录的借贷成本抑制了经济增长和国内需求，巴基斯坦 4 月份的通货膨胀率连续第四个月放缓。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation slowed in April for the fourth straight month as record borrowing costs reined in economic growth and domestic demand.】

item.title: 迪拜再遭风暴袭击，阿联酋航空和迪拜国际航空公司航班中断
item.description: 由于迪拜的恶劣天气，阿联酋航空被迫取消了数个航班，这是这家全球最大的国际航空公司在数周内第二次因降雨影响运营。【原文：Emirates was forced to cancel several flights due to bad weather in Dubai, the second time in as many weeks that operations at the world’s largest international airline have been impaired by rainfall.】

item.title: 必和必拓向南非示好，寻求以 390 亿美元收购盎格鲁集团
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）已向南非派遣了一个高级管理人员团队，这家全球最大的矿业公司正加紧努力赢得政府官员、监管机构和当地股东的支持，所有这些人都可能决定其与竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）拟议合作的结果。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. has deployed a team of senior executives to South Africa as the world’s largest miner ramps up efforts to win over government officials, regulators and local shareholders, all of whom could yet determine the outcome of its proposed tie-up with rival Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 顶级日元预测师认为日元汇率将跌至 1986 年以来最低点
item.description: 据日元的顶级预测机构称，尽管日本可能会努力阻止日元下跌，但日元可能会走弱至1美元兑165日元。【原文：The yen may weaken to 165 per dollar despite potential efforts from Japan to halt its decline, according to the currency’s top forecaster.】

item.title: 路易斯-冯-安解释计算机和人类如何相互学习
item.description:
Duolingo首席执行官讲述人工智能的力量。【原文：

The CEO of Duolingo on the power of AI.

】

item.title: Multiversity 为 11 亿欧元债券销售增加投资者保护措施
item.description: Multiversity SpA 公司在本周宣布 11 亿欧元（12 亿美元）的债券销售计划几小时后就被下调了评级，因此该公司增加了一系列投资者保护措施。【原文：Multiversity SpA has added a number of investor protections to a planned €1.1 billion ($1.2 billion) bond sale after being downgraded this week hours after announcing the deal.】

item.title: 印度取消 Go First 飞机注册，使航母濒临崩溃
item.description: 印度 Go 航空有限公司在申请破产后已停飞一年，其整个机队有可能被收回，这进一步打击了印度航空公司复兴的机会。【原文：Go Airlines India Ltd., which has been grounded for a year after filing for insolvency, risks having its entire fleet of aircraft repossessed in a further blow to any chances of a revival for the Indian carrier.】

item.title: 勒梅尔表示，法国希望道达尔继续在巴黎主城上市
item.description: 法国财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）表示，道达尔能源 SE 将其主要上市地留在法国非常重要，并强调了拥有一家国内石油巨头对法国的益处。【原文：French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire said it’s important TotalEnergies SE keeps its primary listing in France, stressing the benefits to the country of having a domestic oil major.】

item.title: 世界经济有望摆脱滞胀困境，前景一片光明
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（OECD）表示，随着经济增长被证明更具韧性，世界经济前景正在复苏，许多国家的通胀降温速度将快于此前的预期。【原文：The world’s economic outlook is perking up as growth proves more resilient and inflation is set to cool faster than previously expected in many countries, the OECD said.】

item.title: 经合组织认为英国明年在七国集团增长排名中垫底
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development）的最新预测显示，由于隐形税收和高利率挤压经济，英国明年的经济增长速度将比其他主要发达经济体更慢。【原文：Britain will grow more slowly next year than any other major advanced economy as stealth taxes and high interest rates squeeze the economy, the latest forecasts from the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development show.】

item.title: 创纪录的现金需求引发英国央行将停止出售债券的猜测
item.description: 据分析师称，银行对英格兰银行现金的创纪录需求可能导致决策者在几个月内通过债券市场放宽金融条件。【原文：Banks’ record demand for cash from the Bank of England may lead policy makers to ease financial conditions through the bond market within months, according to analysts.】

item.title: 瑞典破产案件连续 21 个月激增 无缓解迹象
item.description: 瑞典信贷安全局（Creditsafe）的数据显示，瑞典 4 月份的破产案件年增长率已连续 21 个月上升。【原文：Bankruptcies in Sweden extended their streak of annual increases to 21 months in April, according to data from Creditsafe, which expects no immediate relief even as inflation slows and rate cuts are approaching.】

item.title: 欧洲央行下令削减俄罗斯业务后，德国莱弗森银行撤回业绩指引
item.description: 在欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）下令加快削减俄罗斯业务后，Raiffeisen Bank International AG 暂停了全年目标，但维持了对核心国家的指导。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG suspended its full-year targets while maintaining the guidance for its core countries, after the European Central Bank ordered a faster reduction of its Russian operations.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率超预期跃升至四个月高点
item.description: 瑞士通胀率跃升至四个月来的新高，超出了经济学家的预期，这使瑞士官员有理由在决定是否再次降息时保持谨慎。【原文：Swiss inflation jumped more than economists anticipated to a four-month high, giving officials grounds for caution as they determine whether to cut interest rates again.】

item.title: 日本央行周四数据或将揭示日本是否再次干预以刺激日元走势
item.description: 交易员们可以从日本央行的数据中寻找线索，以了解日本央行本周是否第二次介入货币市场以阻止日元下滑。【原文：Traders can look to data from the Bank of Japan for clues on whether authorities stepped into the currency market for a second time this week to stem the yen’s slide.】

item.title: 沙特医院集团 Fakeeh 启动利雅得 2024 年最大 IPO
item.description: 沙特医院集团 Soliman Abdul Kader Fakeeh 医院及其股东正寻求在利雅得首次公开募股中筹集高达 28.6 亿里亚尔（约合 7.634 亿美元）的资金，这将是沙特今年迄今为止规模最大的一次公开募股。【原文：Saudi hospital group Dr. Soliman Abdul Kader Fakeeh Hospital and its shareholders are seeking to raise as much as 2.86 billion riyals ($763.4 million) in a Riyadh initial public offering that’s set to be the largest in the kingdom so far this year.】

item.title: 美国比特币 ETF 外流创纪录，贝莱德和富达基金受挫
item.description: 美国现货比特币交易所交易基金遭遇最大单日资金外流，数字代币创下自2023年8月以来最糟糕的一周。【原文：US spot-Bitcoin exchange-traded funds suffered their largest daily outflow as the digital token heads for its worst week since August 2023.】

item.title: 马士基认为全球集装箱贸易前景向好
item.description: 作为全球贸易的风向标，A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S 公司表示，今年年初的强劲势头改善了全球集装箱贸易需求的前景。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S, a bellwether for global trade, said a strong start to the year has improved the outlook for container trade demand worldwide.】

item.title: 壳牌保持回购步伐，利润超出预期
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）在第一季度利润降幅低于预期的情况下，继续加快股票回购步伐，保持了对股东回报的关注，这已成为石油巨头的标志。【原文：Shell Plc kept up the pace of share buybacks as first-quarter profit dropped less than expected, maintaining the focus on shareholder returns that has become a hallmark of the oil majors.】

item.title: 住友商事在新中期计划中提高股东回报率
item.description: 日本贸易公司住友商事（Sumitomo Corp.【原文：Japanese trading firm Sumitomo Corp. said it will buy back its stock and adopt a progressive dividend policy, bringing it in line with the other four major peers in an effort to boost shareholder returns.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
